scripts.buildOutput: npm run buildCore && npm run buildHtml2Json
scripts.buildHtml2Json: rollup ./src/html2Json.js --file ./product/bundle-html2json-esm.js --format es --intro "//This is core convert file"
scripts.buildHtml2Json4CJS: rollup ./src/html2Json.js --file ./product/bundle-html2json-common.js --format cjs --intro "//This is core convert file"
scripts.buildJson2Html4CJS: rollup ./utils/json2xml.js --file ./product/bundle-json2html-common.js --format cjs --intro "//This is auto generate file"
